messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Marshall Brain
messages.msgSnippet: + Leslie, if your + kids liked his book, they may be interested in his website. Oh yes--they do like the website.  We also have the How Stuff Works computer
messages.messageBody:
+ Leslie, if your
+ kids liked his book, they may be interested in his website.

Oh yes--they do like the website. We also have the "How Stuff Works"
computer software and the "How Stuff Works" book. (I think there's more
than one, but we just have the first.) I didn't know he had an email list,
though...will look into that one.

Leslie Moyer

messages.subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Marshall Brain
messages.msgSnippet: I must not be that observant since I didn t recognize the name Marshall Brain - the author of The Teenager s Guide to the Real World .  I get emails from him
messages.messageBody:
I must not be that observant since I didn't recognize the name Marshall Brain - the author of "The Teenager's Guide to the Real World". I get emails from him every day!

We get a free subscription to howstuffworks.com. Leslie, if your kids liked his book, they may be interested in his website. If I got the information on this site from this list, disregard this message.

Pat


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
